channel.title: Klipper
channel.description:
Looks like disabling klipper (https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,517.msg4088.html#msg4088) isn't such a great idea. Would cause an issue...
Is it normal that text in the clipboard gets lost?
http://osdir.com/ml/kde-users/2013-06/msg00001.html

item.title: Klipper
